name: The Glove Insulated Beverage Koozie
description:
The Glove Insulated Beverage Koozie is everything you need to keep that cherished drink in your hand cold and crisp, while not chilling your delicate skin to the bone.  

You can show off your Michigan pride as well as your love for the Lakes anywhere you want to have a drink.  On a boat, grilling out, or just hanging out on the porch with some friends.  This koozie does it all.

Jersey Cloth with a foam backing

Hand Printed on Both Sides

4" wide  X  5" tall

Comes in Black, Red, Navy, and Royal Blue

name: Love The Glove 2"x3" Sticker
description:
Slap this sticker onto anything you want to claim as Michigan territory.  Show the world your Love for the State shaped like a Glove by sticking it to the rear window of your car, the top of your laptop, or the water bottle you drag around every day.

Peel off adhesion

Made in the USA

name: Dandy Lion Tee Heather Grey
description:
The Dandy Lion tee is The Glove Apparel's first collaboration with Michigan artist Naya Pugh.  This is more than a shirt, and more than a drawing.  It is a product of love, energy, and triumph.  Unleash your inner beast and slip into this fine wearable while supporting a true-blood Michigan artist and a local Michigan brand.  

It is hand printed in Michigan and 100% made in the USA.  Enjoy a soft hand printed label where the itchy tag used to be as well as a soft printed design that you can shimmy and shake with.  Show off your love for the great state that fits you like a glove.

4.2 oz. 90% combed & ringspun cotton and 10% polyester

Unisex cut Tee

Available in Small through XX-Large
